humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, eight sentinel lymph nodes were removed and examined, and all eight were found to be free of metastatic carcinoma. Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that eight sentinel lymph nodes were examined and found to be free of metastatic carcinoma (see 'BREAST CARCINOMA SUMMARY' section). Therefore, the pathologic N stage is N0.
